text: Gli amici di Gesù - Giuda is a 2001 Italian-German coproduction television movie produced by Raffaele Mertes. It was included in the Turner Bible Collection series as Close to Jesus - Judas. The cast includes Enrico Lo Verso as Judas, Danny Quinn as Jesus, and Mathieu Carrière as Pilate.Hervé Dumont L'Antiquité au cinéma: Vérités, légendes et manipulations 2009 Page 441 "2001 (rv) Judas/ Giuda /Judas (IT/DE) Raffaele Mertes; série «The Bible (Close to Jésus) /La Bibbia (Gli amici di Gesù)/Die ...
